meanings.definition: Not conforming to or following traditional or conventional norms or practices.
meanings.sent1: She chose a nontraditional career path by becoming a professional skateboarder.
meanings.sent2: The nontraditional wedding ceremony included a dance-off instead of a first dance.
meanings.sent3: It was quite nontraditional to see a cat wearing a top hat and monocle.
meanings.sent4: Her nontraditional approach to problem-solving was like thinking outside the box.
meanings.sent5: The nontraditional art exhibit featured sculptures made entirely of recycled materials.

meanings.definition: Deviating from the usual or customary pattern or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The nontraditional route he took to work involved biking through the park.
meanings.sent2: Her nontraditional choice of dessert was a spicy jalapeno ice cream.
meanings.sent3: The nontraditional idea of wearing pajamas to a job interview made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His nontraditional way of speaking was like a symphony of unexpected words.
meanings.sent5: The nontraditional method of teaching math involved using music and dance.
